Description:
Detects suspicious reconnaissance command line activity on Windows systems using the PowerShell Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Reconnaissance Activity Using Get-LocalGroupMember Cmdlet
Query: sourcetype="windows-sysmon" (command="*domain admins*" OR command="* administrator*" OR command="* administrateur*" OR command="*enterprise admins*" OR command="*Exchange Trusted Subsystem*" OR command="*Remote Desktop Users*" OR command="*Utilisateurs du Bureau Ã  distance*" OR command="*Usuarios de escritorio remoto*") command="*Get-LocalGroupMember *"
